content:
When I run 

./hapi-fhir-cli run-server -f dstu3 --allow-external-refs

./hapi-fhir-cli upload-definitions -f dstu3 -t http://localhost:8080/baseDstu3
./hapi-fhir-cli upload-examples -f dstu3 -c -t http://localhost:8080/baseDstu3

It fails with

10:10:21 ERROR ca.uhn.fhir.cli.App - Error during execution: 
ca.uhn.fhir.rest.server.exceptions.InternalErrorException: Unexpected failure while validating resource
        at org.hl7.fhir.dstu3.hapi.validation.FhirInstanceValidator.validate(FhirInstanceValidator.java:166)
        at org.hl7.fhir.dstu3.hapi.validation.FhirInstanceValidator.validate(FhirInstanceValidator.java:204)
        at org.hl7.fhir.dstu3.hapi.validation.BaseValidatorBridge.doValidate(BaseValidatorBridge.java:24)
        at org.hl7.fhir.dstu3.hapi.validation.BaseValidatorBridge.validateResource(BaseValidatorBridge.java:52)
        at org.hl7.fhir.dstu3.hapi.validation.FhirInstanceValidator.validateResource(FhirInstanceValidator.java:34)
        at ca.uhn.fhir.validation.FhirValidator.validateWithResult(FhirValidator.java:265)
        at ca.uhn.fhir.cli.ExampleDataUploader.getBundleFromFileDstu3(ExampleDataUploader.java:621)
        at ca.uhn.fhir.cli.ExampleDataUploader.getBundleFromFile(ExampleDataUploader.java:228)
        at ca.uhn.fhir.cli.ExampleDataUploader.run(ExampleDataUploader.java:214)
        at ca.uhn.fhir.cli.App.main(App.java:188)
Caused by: ca.uhn.fhir.rest.server.exceptions.InvalidRequestException: unable to find code system http://snomed.info/sct
        at org.hl7.fhir.dstu3.hapi.validation.HapiWorkerContext.expand(HapiWorkerContext.java:290)
        at org.hl7.fhir.dstu3.hapi.validation.HapiWorkerContext.validateCode(HapiWorkerContext.java:244)
        at org.hl7.fhir.dstu3.validation.InstanceValidator.checkPrimitiveBinding(InstanceValidator.java:1049)
        at org.hl7.fhir.dstu3.validation.InstanceValidator.checkPrimitive(InstanceValidator.java:971)
        at org.hl7.fhir.dstu3.validation.InstanceValidator.validateElement(InstanceValidator.java:2690)
        at org.hl7.fhir.dstu3.validation.InstanceValidator.validateElement(InstanceValidator.java:2723)
        at org.hl7.fhir.dstu3.validation.InstanceValidator.start(InstanceValidator.java:1906)
        at org.hl7.fhir.dstu3.validation.InstanceValidator.validateResource(InstanceValidator.java:2886)
        at org.hl7.fhir.dstu3.validation.InstanceValidator.validate(InstanceValidator.java:398)
        at org.hl7.fhir.dstu3.validation.InstanceValidator.validate(InstanceValidator.java:348)
        at org.hl7.fhir.dstu3.validation.InstanceValidator.validate(InstanceValidator.java:337)
        at org.hl7.fhir.dstu3.hapi.validation.FhirInstanceValidator.validate(FhirInstanceValidator.java:164)
        ... 9 common frames omitted

Am I doing something wrong?
